Question: MedivelBIO Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MedivelBIO Co.,Ltd.

Product: Wearable Ultrasound Diagnosis System

- Wearable multi-ultrasonic technology with a flexible human-compatible patch
- Mobile-based multispectral imaging analysis system
- Compact optical structure with high accuracy and reproducibility
- Real-time health management through high-quality image analysis
- User-friendly, non-invasive health monitoring
- Privacy protection measures in line with relevant laws
- Responsible department for privacy protection and customer service: Address: #416, 70, Gasan digital 2-ro, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea Tel.: 82-2-532-4151 E-mail: hyeeun@medivelbio.co.kr
Summary_cn:
中世纪生物有限公司。

产品：可穿戴超声诊断系统

- 可穿戴多超声技术，采用柔软的与人体相容贴片
- 基于移动平台的多光谱成像分析系统
- 小巧的光学结构，具有高精度和可重复性
- 实时健康管理通过高质量的图像分析
- 用户友好的非侵入式健康监测
- 符合相关法律的隐私保护措施
- 隐私保护和客户服务的责任部门：地址：韩国首尔市金浦区加山数字2路70号416室 电话：82-2-532-4151 电子邮箱：hyeeun@medivelbio.co.kr
